html:
We all take the current pandemic very seriously and have adapted our lifestyles accordingly. Shouldn't we focus on our physical and mental wellbeing instead of spending a whole afternoon tracking death statistics?
To help with that, I made a simple Firefox add-on that hides most articles about COVID-19. The tool uses basic text matching to identify posts about SARS-CoV-2 and its consequences. It gained some traction on Hacker News.

Try it out!
